title: As an Club Admin, I want to Receive a Warning when Adding a Player to the Waivers Screen that is listed as Unable
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a Club user clicks the 'Add Player' button on the waivers screen, the system will run a check agains the able/unable EMR endpoint
* Â If the player is listed as Unable in EMR, the system will return a warning:
** Body: This player is currently listed as Unable in EMR. Please contact BOC with any questions.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Cancel

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Receive a Warning when Approving a DFA Tx on a Player that was Unable at the time of Submission
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a BOC Admin user approves a DFA transaction in EBIS, the system will run a check to see if the player was listed as Unable in EMR at the time the DFA transaction was submitted
* If the player is found to have been listed as Unable at the time of submission, the system will bring up a warning:
** Body: This player was listed as Unable at the time of submission.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Cancel

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Receive a Warning when Approving a DFA Tx on an Unable Player
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a BOC Admin user approves a DFA transaction in EBIS, the system will run a check to see if the player is currently listed as Unable in EMR
* If the player is found to be listed as Unable, the system will bring up a warning:
** Body: This player is currently listed as Unable in EMR.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Cancel

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want to Receive a Warning when Submitting a DFA Tx on an Unable Player
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a BOC or Club Admin user submits a DFA transaction in EBIS, the system will run a check to see if the player is currently listed as Unable in EMR
* If the player is found to be listed as Unable, the system will bring up a warning:
** Body: This player is currently listed as Unable in EMR.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Cancel

title: As a BOC Admin, I want 'Request Medicals' button removed if a Club has already requested medicals on the player
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBIS2-2213|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBIS2-2213|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a Club clicks the â€˜Request Medicalsâ€™ button on the Waivers screen, the button will be removed, for that Club
* â€œMedicals Requestedâ€� will be displayed in place of the button
* Clubs who have not requested medicals for that player will continue to see the button
* The button will return if the player appears on a future bulletin

title: Update the domestic reserve count limit to use its own system date rather than the first day of Minor season system date.
custom_steps:
Users have requested that instead of using the first day of minor league season system date we add a new value starting in 2025 which will be used instead.  The 2025 date should be set to 4/4.

We should also enter 4/4 for each future year going out 25 years (as we do for all new system dates so there is a value in place).

Last year the value was tied to start of the AAA season which was also the first day of the minor league season.  This year they are using the start of the AA season and since this may change in future years they want it separated out.

title: As a Draft Ops User, I want to be notified when a draft contract is terms submitted
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a contract is submitted during the Rule 4 Signing Period (7/13-8/25 - system dates) for players that went through the drafted (any signings that would hit the Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility) will generate a new notification:
** Notification: [ORG Code] has submitted terms for [Player Roster First + Player Last] with a bonus of [Bonus Amount].
** Bucket: Minor Contracts
** High priority: No
** Slack: Yes
** Slack Channel: _________________________
** User Groups: Minor Contracts BOC Admin
** Link: Notification should link to the contract

title: As a MNC Admin, I want 0.000 MLS players on subsequent MJCs to recieve a higher minimum salary when optioned or outrighted
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player with 0.000 MLS is optioned or outrighted while on a subsequent MJC (not their first career MJC), EBIS will use the â€œMinimum Minor League Salary LRDâ€� amount
* If the player has a P2 that is greater than the â€œMinimum Minor League Salary LRDâ€� amount, EBIS will use the P2 instead

** On hover, the icon will display text that says, â€œPlayer listed as Unableâ€�

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see if a Player placed on OR Waivers is listed as Unable in EMR
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new column on the far left of the Requested Waivers table
* Upon submission of an OR Waiver Request, the system will run a check to see if that player is listed as â€œUnableâ€� in the EMR
** If the player is â€œUnable,â€� a red exclamation point icon will appear in the column

title: Add an "Other Bonuses" Section to the MJ Terms of an MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

* On an MNC, under Addendum B, there will be a new â€œOther Bonusesâ€� section under Major-League Terms
* When expanded, the section will mirror the current Performance Bonus and Award Bonus sections on the MNC
* The Criteria dropdown will only have the following option:
** Days on Major League Roster (Active Days)
* Any amount added to this section should be included in the MJ Terms Total Compensation count
* If the MJ Terms Total Compensation exceeds $4 million, the following warning message will appear on Submit:
** â€œMJ Terms Total Compensation may not be more than $4,000,000. Please contact the BOC for assistance.â€�

title: CEP/CSP Updated Status UI
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67a671bbf064c2085cf09286|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67a671bbf064c2085cf09286|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67ad119f68b8d687bf32144a|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67ad119f68b8d687bf32144a|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a playerâ€™s allowance has lapsed, it should be displayed in the status under the player name and in the Status row under the â€œScholarship Detailsâ€� section
** The date of lapse should display for each category (Living, Tuition)
* The Status of the player for either category should match the format displayed in the attached wireframes
** â€œLapsedâ€� will appear where applicable in a red tag with the lapsed date
** â€œCurrentâ€� will appear where applicable in a green tag
* When the allowance has lapsed, the Overview progress bar should be grayed out for the relevant category (or both) to indicate that the allowance is no longer active or current
** The date of the lapse should appear next to the Tuition Allowance/Living Allowance labels, if applicable 
* If the player has not been awarded either of one category, the progress bar will be grayed out
** The Status for that category should appear as â€œN/Aâ€�
* If a player has used up all of their awarded allowance of either category, the progress bar will show as completely filled, and a â€œCompletedâ€� status will display
** Note: This requirement is not reflected in the wireframe

title: Custom Notification -
custom_steps:
When a Custom notification is sent, the Title, Body, etc remain after sending.Â  This is not impacting functionality  but could be a small UX issue. 

Potential options after discussion with Brian - 

* A clear button where it blanks out every field. (a reset button in other words)
* blanking it out automatically after sending but allow clicking a row to reload the info in case User wants to resend to another group or same user population. 
* Other suggestions?

title: As League Econ User, I want Club Users to view any MJC with a CT Date Entered, regardless of state
custom_steps:
AC:

* Club users with MJC permissions will be able to see any MJC that has a confirmed terms date entered, regardless of state
** For example, if LA has a MJC in Preliminary or Terms Submitted state, and the BOC has entered a CT Date on that contract, NYY will be able to view the contract

title: As a League Econ Admin, I do not want Clubs able to edit Confirmed Terms Date on MJCs
custom_steps:
Currently: Club users are able to enter / edit the Confirmed Terms dates on MJCs

AC:

* Confirmed Terms date on MJCs will not be editable to Club users in any state

title: Update the International Signing Period so that it consistently uses the same year as the period
custom_steps:
Currently, the system dates for the intl signing period are offset from the year of the actual signing period (see the attached screenshot).  We need to update these to make them the same year as the actual signing period / calendar year.

This will require ensuring that loading old data still loads the right period's information.

title: Convert the Major Contract Award Bonus Packages widget to react
Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)

title: Solution for Creating and Terminating Contracts for Released Players That Were Tendered
custom_steps:
Ability to go from Prelim to Terminated on a MJC (BOC Only)

* No transactions

If a tendered player on MJ Roster is released and does not have MJC covering the following season, auto create a MJC at the Tender Amount (from the tender utility)

* And then auto-terminate
* Batch?
* Utility, add to Tender Utility
